name: Encom(Tron)
description:
Race and fight against other light cycles from the classic arcade game Tron in 3D. Encom is a multiplayer snake game that requires each player to trap their opponents in their trail while avoiding walls and other trails. Play against A.I or verse other players on the same keyboard in multiplayer.

Music by ADN Compositions:
Link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UIH_MykAMKg
